pages.text: The bazooka is quite the explosive weapon, launching an explosive projectile towards enemies and enemy bases.$(br)This weapon will definitely make a bang in your world, you can use it to break barricades or just blow up the enemy.$(br)
The specs of the bazooka are.$(br)$(li1)Range: Mid,$(li1)Speed: 2 Seconds,$(li1)Projectiles: 1.$(br)
